metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: 4 cups chicken broth   1 4 cup soy sauce   2 tablespoons miso paste   2 cloves garlic, minced   1 piece ginger, sliced   1 2 pound pork belly, sliced   4 eggs, soft-boiled   8 ounces ramen noodles   Sliced green onions, nori, and sesame seeds for garnish

4 chicken thighs   1 small onion, diced   2 cloves garlic, minced   1 cup red wine   1 cup chicken broth   1 cup mushrooms, sliced   1 cup carrots, sliced   1 4 cup bacon, chopped   2 tablespoons tomato paste   2 tablespoons flour
1 pound spaghetti   4 eggs   1 cup grated Parmesan cheese   1 2 cup pancetta, diced   2 cloves garlic, minced   1 4 cup heavy cream (optional)   Salt and pepper to taste   Chopped parsley for garnish
o 1 package dumpling wrappers o 1 2 pound ground pork o 1 2 cup chopped cabbage o 1 4 cup chopped green onions o 2 cloves garlic o 1 tablespoon soy sauce o 1 teaspoon sesame oil o Oil for frying

1 whole wheat tortilla   1 cup cooked chicken breast, sliced   1 cup romaine lettuce, chopped   2 tablespoons Caesar dressing   2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese   Optional: croutons for extra crunch
